derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: a deliberate respelling of light, light

entry.tran: （食物或饮料）低热量的，低糖的，低脂的；低酒精的
entry.def: Lite is used to describe foods or drinks that contain few calories or low amounts of sugar, fat, or alcohol.
If you describe something as lite, you dislike it because it is a weaker and less demanding version of something else.

example.ex: ... an extended, self congratulatory session of easy-listening jazz-lite.
